nodes.label: require ! (ctx . accounts . authority_015 . is_signer , CustomError :: MissingSigner) ;
require_keys_eq (ctx . accounts . stake_acc_015 . staker , ctx . accounts . authority_015 . key () , CustomError :: InvalidOwner)
let before_stake = ctx . accounts . stake_acc_015 . locked ;
ctx . accounts . stake_acc_015 . locked = before_stake . checked_sub (amount) . ok_or (CustomError :: Underflow) ? ;
* * ctx . accounts . authority_015 . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? += amount ;
